flawed_nl_solution:
The third dig site was dated from the year 8400 / 2 = <<8400/2=4200>>4200 BC.
Thus, the first dig site was dated from the year 4200 - 3700 = <<4200-3700=497>>497 BC.
The second dig site was 352 years older, so it was dated from the year 497 + 352 = <<497+352=849>>849 BC.
#### 849

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 497. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
